#summary Remove information about a scene from the grid service.
#labels Protocol-Grid

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||RemoveScene||String||Yes||
||`SceneID`||UUID of the scene to remove||UUID||Yes||

{{{
RequestMethod=RemoveScene
&SceneID=ceb3c0c7-c610-49cb-b89f-479b67f1fcbe
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if the scene was removed or did not exist, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":true,
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":false,
    "Message":"An unknown error occurred"
}
}}}
